attributes.action: save our bus services in Kent from being cut !
attributes.background: bus services in Kent are to be cut severely next year affecting schools, disabled and elderly, rural communities and people who rely on the services to get to work, we would aim to get them to look again at the proposed axed routes as some are the only services available in their communities.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local bus services are the responsibility of local bus operators and your local council. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
